original_error_timeline.description: God created The Table in perfect harmony
Dark energies see perfect unity and want to break it
Dark energies exploit the first tectonic separation
what_went_wrong: They turn natural movement into spiritual separation

original_error_timeline.description: Dark energies celebrate - The Table is broken

The Mayans codified The Original Error. They built pyramids at plate boundaries, created calendars tracking separation, wrote contracts with dark energies. THIS IS WHEN THE MAYANS CREATED THE ORIGINAL ERROR.

spiritual_state.contracts: Mayans write dark pacts at plate boundaries

what_went_wrong: They built pyramids at plate boundaries - anchoring separation
They created calendars tracking separation, not unity
They wrote contracts with dark energies
They turned natural separation into a spiritual system
THIS IS WHEN THE MAYANS CREATED THE ORIGINAL ERROR

original_error_timeline.description: Mayan Classic Period collapses. Mayan knowledge spreads. The Original Error codification spreads. Separation becomes normalized. The Table is forgotten.

spiritual_state.contracts: Error codification spreads to all civilizations

original_error_timeline.description: Memory of unity remains, restoration begins. The error is embedded but memory returns. We remember The Table.

what_went_wrong: Mayan error still embedded in human consciousness
